         int shares,

        Calls model to buy single stock.
        Parameters:
        commission - commission value.
        stockName - name of the stock.
        shares - number of shares.
        portfolio - name of the portfolio.

      • buyMultiple

        void buyMultiple(java.lang.Double commission,
                 java.lang.String amount,
                 java.lang.String portfolioName,
                 java.lang.String date,
                 int[] weightArray)
        Calls model to buy multiple stocks in a portfolio
        Parameters:
        commission - commision value.
        amount - investment amount.
        portfolioName - name of portfolio.
        date - date of transaction.
        weightArray - weights of the stocks.

      • periodicInvestment

        void periodicInvestment(double commission,
                        double investment,
                        java.lang.String portfolioName,
                        java.lang.String sDate,
                        java.lang.String edate,
                        int intervals,
                        int[] weightArray)
        calls model to buy periodic Investment.
        Parameters:
        commission - commission value.
        investment - investment amount.
        portfolioName - name of the portfolio.
        sDate - start date.
        edate - end date.
        intervals - intervals in days.
        weightArray - weights of the stocks.
